increments.focus: User accounts + basic profiles + basic search

concepts.name: User Account
concepts.description: A user's account record containing email address, password hash, account status (pending verification, active, inactive), and account creation timestamp

concepts.name: User Profile
concepts.description: A user's profile information including username, bio, profile picture URL, favorite character, and profile creation/update timestamps

concepts.name: Email Verification
concepts.description: The process of verifying a user's email address through a verification token sent via email service, which activates the account

concepts.name: Search Query
concepts.description: A user's search request containing search term, optional filters (users, merchandise, videos), and search parameters

concepts.name: Search Results
concepts.description: Grouped search results containing matching merchandise items, user profiles, and videos, organized by type

concepts.name: Category
concepts.description: A content category (Comics, Action Figures, Videos, etc.) that organizes merchandise and videos for browsing

concepts.name: Profile Picture
concepts.description: An image file uploaded by user, validated for format and size, stored in file storage/CDN, and displayed on user profile

behaviors.behavior: User enters email and password on sign-up form, then system validates email format and password strength, creates account record in database with pending status, and email service sends verification email
User clicks verification link in email, then system validates verification token, updates account status to active, and redirects user to profile creation
User enters username and bio, then system validates username uniqueness, saves profile information to database, and displays profile page with saved information
User selects image file and uploads, then system validates image format (JPEG, PNG) and size (max 5MB), uploads to file storage/CDN, saves URL to profile, and displays on profile page
User enters search term and optionally selects filter, then system queries search/indexing service across merchandise, users, and videos, and returns grouped results
User selects category, then system loads category content from database, applies pagination and optional sorting, and displays content with navigation controls

rules.rule: Email addresses must be unique across all accounts
Passwords must meet strength requirements: minimum 8 characters, at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number
Usernames must be unique across all profiles
Profile pictures must be in JPEG or PNG format and cannot exceed 5MB in size
Search must handle empty results gracefully by displaying a message and suggesting alternative searches
Category content must be paginated with a maximum of 20 items per page

epics.name: Manage User Accounts
epics.purpose: Users create accounts, build profiles, and manage their identity on the platform

features.name: Create User Account
features.purpose: New users sign up and create their account

stories.name: Sign Up with Email
stories.description: User enters email address and password on sign-up form, then system validates email format and password strength, creates account in database, and sends verification email via email service
behavioral_ac: When user enters email address and password on sign-up form and clicks submit, then system validates email format is valid
When system validates email format, then system validates password meets strength requirements (minimum 8 characters, at least one uppercase, one lowercase, and one number)
When email format is invalid, then system displays error message indicating invalid email format and does not create account
When password does not meet strength requirements, then system displays error message indicating password requirements and does not create account
When email format and password are valid, then system checks if email address already exists in database
When email address already exists, then system displays error message indicating email is already registered and does not create account
When email address is unique and credentials are valid, then system creates account record in database with pending status and sends verification email via email service
When system creates account, then system displays success message and redirects user to email verification page

stories.name: Verify Email Address
stories.description: User clicks verification link in email, then system verifies email address and activates account
behavioral_ac: When user clicks verification link in email, then system extracts verification token from link
When system extracts verification token, then system validates token is valid and not expired
When verification token is invalid or expired, then system displays error message and does not activate account
When verification token is valid, then system updates account status from pending to active in database
When system activates account, then system redirects user to profile creation page and displays success message

stories.name: Log In to Account
stories.description: User enters email and password, then system authenticates credentials and logs user into their account
behavioral_ac: When user enters email and password on login form and clicks submit, then system looks up account by email address in database
When account is not found, then system displays error message indicating invalid credentials and does not log in user
When account is found, then system verifies password hash matches stored password hash
When password does not match, then system displays error message indicating invalid credentials and does not log in user
When password matches, then system checks if account status is active
When account status is not active (pending verification), then system displays error message indicating email verification is required and does not log in user
When account status is active and credentials are valid, then system creates user session and logs user into their account
When system logs in user, then system redirects user to home page and displays welcome message

stories.name: Reset Forgotten Password
stories.description: User requests password reset, then system sends password reset email with link, and user sets new password
behavioral_ac: When user enters email address on password reset form and clicks submit, then system looks up account by email address
When account is not found, then system displays generic message indicating reset email will be sent (for security, does not reveal if email exists)
When account is found, then system generates password reset token and saves it to database with expiration time
When system generates reset token, then email service sends password reset email with reset link containing token to user's email address
When user clicks password reset link in email, then system extracts reset token from link and validates token is valid and not expired
When reset token is invalid or expired, then system displays error message and does not allow password reset
When reset token is valid, then system displays password reset form for user to enter new password
When user enters new password and confirms password on reset form and clicks submit, then system validates new password meets strength requirements
When new password does not meet strength requirements, then system displays error message indicating password requirements and does not reset password
When new password meets requirements, then system updates password hash in database and invalidates reset token
When system resets password, then system displays success message and redirects user to login page

stories.name: Log Out of Account
stories.description: User clicks log out, then system ends user session and redirects to home page
behavioral_ac: When user clicks log out button, then system ends user session and clears session data
When system ends session, then system redirects user to home page and displays message indicating successful logout

features.name: Build User Profile
features.purpose: Users customize their profile with pictures, bio, and preferences

stories.name: Create Basic Profile
stories.description: User enters username and bio after account creation, then system saves profile information and displays profile page
behavioral_ac: When user enters username and bio on profile creation form and clicks submit, then system validates username is not empty and meets length requirements
When username is empty or does not meet length requirements, then system displays error message and does not save profile
When username is valid, then system checks if username is unique across all profiles
When username already exists, then system displays error message indicating username is taken and does not save profile
When username is unique and valid, then system saves profile information to database and links it to user account
When system saves profile, then system displays profile page with saved username and bio information

stories.name: Upload Profile Picture
stories.description: User selects image file and uploads, then system validates image format and size, uploads to file storage, and displays on profile
behavioral_ac: When user selects image file and clicks upload, then system validates image file format is JPEG or PNG
When image format is not JPEG or PNG, then system displays error message indicating invalid format and does not upload file
When image format is valid, then system validates image file size does not exceed 5MB
When image file size exceeds 5MB, then system displays error message indicating file is too large and does not upload file
When image format and size are valid, then system uploads image file to file storage/CDN
When file upload completes, then system saves image URL to user profile in database
When system saves image URL, then system displays profile picture on user profile page

stories.name: Edit Profile Information
stories.description: User updates username, bio, or other profile fields, then system validates changes and saves updated profile
behavioral_ac: When user updates username, bio, or other profile fields on edit form and clicks save, then system validates username is not empty if username is being changed
When username is being changed and new username is empty, then system displays error message and does not save changes
When username is being changed and new username is valid, then system checks if new username is unique across all profiles
When new username already exists, then system displays error message indicating username is taken and does not save changes
When username is unique or not being changed, then system validates all profile fields meet requirements
When profile fields are valid, then system saves updated profile information to database
When system saves updated profile, then system displays updated profile page with saved changes and displays success message

stories.name: View User Profile
stories.description: User navigates to profile page, then system displays profile information including username, bio, profile picture, and account creation date
behavioral_ac: When user navigates to their profile page, then system loads profile information from database
When system loads profile, then system displays profile page with username, bio, profile picture (if uploaded), favorite character (if set), and account creation date

stories.name: View Other User Profile
stories.description: User clicks on another user's name or profile link, then system displays that user's public profile information
behavioral_ac: When user clicks on another user's name or profile link, then system loads that user's public profile information from database
When system loads other user's profile, then system displays public profile page with username, bio, profile picture (if uploaded), favorite character (if set), and account creation date
When other user's profile does not exist, then system displays error message indicating profile not found

stories.name: Set Favorite Character
stories.description: User selects favorite Spider-Man character from list, then system saves preference and displays on profile
behavioral_ac: When user selects favorite Spider-Man character from dropdown list and clicks save, then system validates selected character is from allowed list
When selected character is valid, then system saves favorite character preference to user profile in database
When system saves favorite character, then system displays selected character on user profile page and displays success message

epics.name: Trade Items

features.name: Mark Items for Trade
features.purpose: Users mark merchandise items as available for trade

features.name: Propose Trade
features.purpose: User proposes a trade with another user, selecting items from both collections

concepts.name: Trade Proposal
concepts.description: A request from one user to another to exchange specific items, including items offered and items requested

concepts.name: Trade Status
concepts.description: The current state of a trade: pending, accepted, rejected, completed, or cancelled

behaviors.behavior: User selects items from their collection and items from target user's collection, then system creates trade proposal and notifies target user

stories.name: Create Trade Proposal
stories.description: User selects items from their collection and items from another user's available-for-trade collection, then system creates trade proposal and sends notification to target user
behavioral_ac: When user selects items from their collection and items from target user's available-for-trade collection, then system creates trade proposal with status 'pending'
When system creates trade proposal, then system sends notification to target user
When user submits trade proposal with invalid items, then system displays error message and does not create proposal

stories.name: View Trade Proposal
stories.description: User receives notification of trade proposal, then system displays proposal details showing items offered and items requested
behavioral_ac: When user clicks on trade proposal notification, then system displays proposal page with items offered and items requested
When system displays trade proposal, then system shows proposal status, creation date, and both users' profiles
When user views trade proposal, then system enables accept, reject, and message actions

features.name: Negotiate Trade
features.purpose: Users discuss trade details through messaging system before accepting or rejecting

concepts.name: Trade Message
concepts.description: A message sent between users as part of a trade negotiation, linked to a specific trade proposal

behaviors.behavior: User sends message about trade proposal, then system delivers message to other user and links it to the trade proposal

stories.name: Send Trade Message
stories.description: User types message about trade proposal and clicks send, then system delivers message to other user and links it to the trade proposal thread
behavioral_ac: When user types message in trade proposal thread and clicks send, then system saves message and links it to trade proposal
When system saves trade message, then system delivers message to other user and sends notification
When user sends empty message, then system displays validation error and does not send message

stories.name: Receive Trade Message
stories.description: System receives trade message from other user, then system displays message in trade thread and sends notification to recipient user
behavioral_ac: When system receives trade message from other user, then system displays message in trade thread in chronological order
When system displays new trade message, then system sends notification to recipient user based on their notification preferences
When user views trade thread, then system marks all messages in thread as read

features.name: Complete Trade
features.purpose: Users accept trade, mark items as traded, and complete the transaction

concepts.name: Trade Completion
concepts.description: The finalization of a trade where both users confirm receipt and items are marked as traded

behaviors.behavior: User accepts trade proposal, then system updates trade status to accepted, marks items as traded, and enables rating after completion

stories.name: Accept Trade Proposal
stories.description: User clicks accept on trade proposal, then system updates trade status to accepted, marks both users' items as traded, and enables rating option for both users
behavioral_ac: When user clicks accept on trade proposal, then system updates trade status to 'accepted'
When system updates trade status to accepted, then system marks both users' items as 'traded' and removes them from available-for-trade collections
When trade is accepted, then system enables rating option for both users and sends confirmation notification to both users

stories.name: Rate Trade Partner
stories.description: User selects rating and writes feedback after trade completion, then system saves rating to trade partner's profile and updates their trading reputation
behavioral_ac: When user selects rating (1-5 stars) and writes feedback after trade completion, then system saves rating and feedback to trade partner's profile
When system saves rating, then system recalculates trade partner's average rating and updates their trading reputation score
When user submits rating without selecting a star rating, then system displays validation error and does not save rating

features.name: View Trade History
features.purpose: Users view their completed trades and trading reputation

features.name: Manage Wishlist
features.purpose: Users list items they are looking for to help other users find trading opportunities

concepts.name: Video Upload

concepts.name: Video Processing

behaviors.behavior: User selects video file and uploads, then system validates file size and format, transfers to video storage service, and processes for streaming

stories.name: Upload Video File
stories.description: User selects video file and clicks upload, then system validates file size and format, transfers file to video storage service, and initiates video processing
behavioral_ac: When user selects video file and clicks upload, then system validates file size is within limits and format is supported
When file validation passes, then system transfers file to video storage service and displays upload progress
When file transfer completes, then system initiates video processing and displays processing status
When user uploads file that exceeds size limit or unsupported format, then system displays error message and does not upload file

stories.name: Add Video Metadata

behavioral_ac: When user enters title, description, category, and character tags for video, then system saves metadata and links it to video file
When user submits metadata form with required title field empty, then system displays validation error and does not save metadata
When system saves metadata, then system enables publish button for user

stories.name: Publish Fan Film
stories.description: User clicks publish after video processing completes, then system makes video available for viewing and adds it to creator's profile
behavioral_ac: When user clicks publish after video processing completes, then system makes video available for public viewing
When system publishes video, then system adds video to creator's profile and makes it discoverable in search and browse
When user tries to publish video before processing completes, then system displays message that video is still processing

features.name: Watch Fan Films
features.purpose: Users watch fan films using video player and interact with content

concepts.name: Video Streaming
concepts.description: The delivery of video content from video storage service to user's browser for playback

behaviors.behavior: User clicks play on video, then system requests video stream from video storage service and video player displays streaming content

stories.name: Play Fan Film
stories.description: User clicks play button on video, then system requests video stream from video storage service and video player displays streaming content with playback controls
behavioral_ac: When user clicks play button on video, then system requests video stream from video storage service
When system receives video stream, then video player displays streaming content with playback controls (play, pause, volume, fullscreen)
When video stream fails to load, then system displays error message and retry option

features.name: Organize Playlists

features.name: Rate and Comment on Videos

behavioral_ac: When user writes post title and content, selects forum topic category, and clicks submit, then system creates new thread
When system creates new thread, then system adds thread to forum topic list and displays it to other users
When user submits thread without title or content, then system displays validation error and does not create thread

features.name: Reply to Thread

concepts.name: Forum Reply

behaviors.behavior: User writes reply content, then system adds reply to thread in chronological order and notifies thread creator

stories.description: User writes reply content and clicks post, then system adds reply to thread in chronological order, updates thread activity timestamp, and sends notification to thread creator
behavioral_ac: When user writes reply content and clicks post, then system adds reply to thread in chronological order
When system adds reply, then system updates thread activity timestamp and sends notification to thread creator
When user submits empty reply, then system displays validation error and does not post reply

features.name: Vote on Posts
features.purpose: Users upvote or downvote helpful posts to surface quality content

concepts.name: Post Vote
concepts.description: A user's upvote or downvote on a forum post that affects the post's visibility and ranking

behaviors.behavior: User clicks upvote or downvote on post, then system records vote, updates post score, and adjusts post ranking in thread

stories.name: Vote on Forum Post
stories.description: User clicks upvote or downvote button on post, then system records vote, updates post score, recalculates post ranking in thread, and updates display order
behavioral_ac: When user clicks upvote or downvote button on post, then system records vote and updates post score
When system updates post score, then system recalculates post ranking in thread and updates display order
When user votes on their own post, then system displays error message and does not record vote

features.name: Moderate Content

epics.name: Search and Discover Content
epics.purpose: Users find merchandise, videos, users, and content through search and browsing

features.name: Search Content
features.purpose: Users search for specific items, users, or videos using search bar

stories.name: Search by Keyword
stories.description: User enters search term in search bar and clicks search, then system searches across merchandise, users, and videos and displays matching results
behavioral_ac: When user enters search term in search bar and clicks search, then system validates search term is not empty
When search term is empty, then system displays error message and does not perform search
When search term is valid, then system queries search/indexing service across merchandise, user profiles, and videos
When system receives search results, then system groups results by type (merchandise, users, videos) and displays grouped results to user

stories.name: View Search Results
stories.description: System displays search results grouped by type (merchandise, users, videos), then user can click on any result to view details
behavioral_ac: When system displays search results grouped by type, then system shows merchandise results section, users results section, and videos results section
When user clicks on a merchandise result, then system navigates to merchandise detail page
When user clicks on a user profile result, then system navigates to that user's public profile page
When user clicks on a video result, then system navigates to video detail page

stories.name: Search for Users
stories.description: User selects 'Users' filter and enters search term, then system searches user profiles and displays matching users
behavioral_ac: When user selects 'Users' filter and enters search term and clicks search, then system validates search term is not empty
When search term is valid, then system queries search/indexing service for user profiles matching search term
When system receives user profile results, then system displays matching users with profile information (username, profile picture, favorite character)

stories.name: Search for Merchandise
stories.description: User selects 'Merchandise' filter and enters search term, then system searches merchandise posts and displays matching items
behavioral_ac: When user selects 'Merchandise' filter and enters search term and clicks search, then system validates search term is not empty
When search term is valid, then system queries search/indexing service for merchandise posts matching search term
When system receives merchandise results, then system displays matching merchandise items with photos and descriptions

stories.name: View Empty Search Results
stories.description: User searches for term with no matches, then system displays message indicating no results found and suggests alternative searches
behavioral_ac: When user searches for term with no matches, then system displays message indicating no results found for search term
When system displays empty results, then system suggests alternative searches or popular categories to help user discover content

features.name: Browse by Category
features.purpose: Users browse merchandise and videos organized by categories

stories.name: Browse Category List
stories.description: User navigates to browse page, then system displays list of available categories (Comics, Action Figures, Videos, etc.)
behavioral_ac: When user navigates to browse page, then system loads list of available categories from database
When system loads categories, then system displays category list with category names (Comics, Action Figures, Videos, etc.) and item counts for each category

stories.name: View Category Content
stories.description: User clicks on category, then system displays all merchandise and videos in that category with pagination
behavioral_ac: When user clicks on category, then system loads merchandise and videos for that category from database
When system loads category content, then system applies pagination with maximum 20 items per page
When system applies pagination, then system displays first page of category content with pagination controls (next page, page numbers)

stories.name: Sort Category Results
stories.description: User selects sort option (newest, oldest, most popular), then system reorders category content and displays sorted results
behavioral_ac: When user selects sort option (newest, oldest, most popular) from dropdown, then system applies sort order to category content
When system applies sort order, then system reorders category content according to selected sort option
When system reorders content, then system displays sorted results on current page with pagination maintained

stories.name: Navigate Category Pages
stories.description: User clicks next page or page number, then system loads and displays next page of category content
behavioral_ac: When user clicks next page button or page number, then system loads next page of category content from database
When system loads next page, then system displays next page of category content with updated pagination controls
When user clicks on last page, then system displays last page of content and disables next page button

features.name: Filter Search Results
features.purpose: Users apply filters to narrow search results by condition, year, or other criteria

features.name: View Featured Content
features.purpose: Users discover highlighted collections and popular fan films

epics.name: Manage Notifications
epics.purpose: Users receive alerts about comments, trades, and activity through email or in-app notifications

features.name: Receive Trade Notifications
features.purpose: Users get notified when someone proposes a trade or sends trade message

concepts.name: Email Notification
concepts.description: An email message sent to user's email address via email service when specific events occur

concepts.name: Notification Preference
concepts.description: User's choice of how to receive notifications: email only, in-app only, or both

behaviors.behavior: System detects trade event, checks user's notification preferences, then email service sends notification email to user's email address

stories.name: Send Trade Proposal Email
stories.description: System detects new trade proposal, checks recipient's notification preferences, then email service sends notification email with trade details to recipient's email address
behavioral_ac: When system detects new trade proposal, then system checks recipient's notification preferences
When recipient's notification preferences include email, then email service sends notification email with trade details to recipient's email address
When recipient's notification preferences are in-app only, then system does not send email and only sends in-app notification

stories.name: Send Trade Message Email
stories.description: System detects new trade message, checks recipient's notification preferences, then email service sends notification email with message preview to recipient's email address
behavioral_ac: When system detects new trade message, then system checks recipient's notification preferences
When recipient's notification preferences include email, then email service sends notification email with message preview to recipient's email address
When email service fails to send email, then system logs error and continues with in-app notification

features.name: Receive Comment Notifications
features.purpose: Users get notified when someone comments on their merchandise posts or fan films

behaviors.behavior: System detects comment on user's content, checks user's notification preferences, then email service sends notification email to user's email address

stories.name: Send Comment Notification Email
stories.description: System detects comment on user's merchandise post or fan film, checks user's notification preferences, then email service sends notification email with comment preview to user's email address
behavioral_ac: When system detects comment on user's merchandise post or fan film, then system checks user's notification preferences
When user's notification preferences include email, then email service sends notification email with comment preview to user's email address
When user has disabled comment notifications, then system does not send email or in-app notification

features.name: Manage Notification Preferences
features.purpose: Users configure how they want to receive notifications

solution.name: Spider-Man Fan Community Website
solution.purpose: A social network platform where Spider-Man fans can share merchandise, trade collectibles, upload fan-made films, and connect with other fans
